    • Method Detail

      • login

        @PostMapping(value="/login")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Profile> login(java.lang.String username,
                                                                                            java.lang.String password)
        processes login attempt via http request from client
        Parameters:
        username -
        password -
        Returns:
        secure token as json

      • addNewProfile

        @PostMapping(value="/register")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Profile> addNewProfile(@Valid @RequestBody
                                                                                                       @Valid Profile profile)
        Post request that gets client profile registration info and then checks to see if information is not a duplicate in the database. If info is not a duplicate, it sets Authorization headers and calls profile service to add the request body profile to the database.
        Parameters:
        profile -
        Returns:
        a response with the new profile and status created

      • getProfileByPid

        @GetMapping(value="{id}")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Profile> getProfileByPid(@PathVariable(value="id")
                                                                                                   int id)
        Get Mapping that grabs the profile by the path variable id. It then returns the profile if it is valid.
        Parameters:
        id -
        Returns:
        Profile object with HttpStatusAccepted or HttpStatusBackRequest

      • updateProfile

        @PutMapping
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Profile> updateProfile(@RequestBody
                                                                                   Profile profile)
        Put mapping grabs the updated fields of profile and updates the profile in the database. If no token is sent in the token it fails the Auth and doesn't update the profile.
        Parameters:
        profile -
        Returns:
        Updated profile with HttpStatus.ACCEPTED otherwise if invalid returns HttpStatus.BAD_REQUEST

      • newFollower

        @PostMapping(value="/follow")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.lang.String> newFollower(java.lang.String email,
                                                                                                            javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest req)
        Adds profile to list of profiles being followed by user
        Parameters:
        email - email of profile to follow
        req - http request including the user's authorization token in the "Authroization" header
        Returns:

      • unfollow

        @PostMapping(value="/unfollow")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.lang.String> unfollow(java.lang.String email,
                                                                                                           javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest req)
        Removed profile from list of profiles being followed by the user
        Parameters:
        email - email of the profile to be unfollowed
        req - http request including the user's authorization token in the "Authroization" header
        Returns:
        OK response with new authorization token, bad request response if unsuccessful
